reviewText: Great experience from ordering all the way thru watching a great DVD!!!
This was purchased for my son to show in his school Health and PE classes part of his lessons on life experiences.
Being that I am an SEC Fan (born and raised in Louisiana), this DVD was quite the enjoyment for me and my family.
Very good. Also includes the Color Orange The Condredge Holloway Story.

Only 4 of the 10 episodes? ESPN did the exact same thing with the 30 for 30 series by rushing a Volume 1 instead of doing the whole series originally..... Strange marketing from such a great company..... This will be an easy 5-star review whenever they release the full product; until then I would hold off on this.
Excellent coverage of the women in sports and the impact they made after being allowed to participate. I was surprised at the struggle to gain access to the locker room.
